official_title: To amend section 255 of the National Housing Act to extend the mortgage insurance program for home equity conversion mortgages for elderly homeowners, and for other purposes.
short_title: Home Equity Conversion Mortgage Program Extension Act of 1995

summary.text: Home Equity Conversion Mortgage Program Extension Act of 1995 - Amends the National Housing Act to extend and enlarge the mortgage insurance program for home equity conversion mortgages for elderly homeowners.

titles.title: Home Equity Conversion Mortgage Program Extension Act of 1995
To amend section 255 of the National Housing Act to extend the mortgage insurance program for home equity conversion mortgages for elderly homeowners, and for other purposes.
